sentences.en: As his political stature has shrunk, he has grown correspondingly more dependent on the army.
sentences.cn: 随着政治声望不断降低，他相应地变得更依赖于军队了。

sentences.en: There are two sorts of ways you could fiddle with neurotransmitters and correspondingly two sorts of drugs.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过两种方式来控制神经递质，相应地，也就有两种对应的药物。
对他们的期待也相应地变高了。
